text.p: Siebel Systems Inc and Compaq Computer Corp said Tuesday they agreed to a global partnership to provide integrated enterprise solutions for automating sales, telemarketing and call-center information systems.

As part of the pact, Compaq has selected Siebel as its preferred sales automation solutions partner. In turn, Siebel selected Compaq as its software development and preferred deployment platform for Microsoft Corp's Windows NT.
The companies said they will be involved in joint testing, performance optimization and technology sharing, as well as coordinating field sales and support activities.
The companies said they will work together to deliver Siebel-ready solutions that include portables, desktops, servers, networking products and services for customers and Compaq's partners.
Details of the partnership's terms were not disclosed.
